paragraph1: The Gamma Omicron Alumni Association (GOAA) serves as the enduring bond between more than 1,200 brothers who wore the Pi Kappa Alpha badge at Ohio University. Through events, newsletters, scholarships, and support of the active chapter, GOAA keeps the brotherhood alive long after graduation. The current Chapter is actively seeking brothers to rebuild the GOAA. If you are interested in hearing more, please reach out to ohiopikes@gmail.com or text (440) 453-6752.
pull_quote: The true measure of a fraternity is not in the men it initiates, but in the men it produces.
paragraph2: GOAA organizes annual reunions, a popular golf outing, and "Feed‑a‑Pike" nights that bring alumni and actives together. Annual dues of $35 fund these activities, the chapter newsletter, web hosting, and travel to leadership conferences.
dues_card_items: Alumni events, reunions, and golf outing
